extracted_data_phrases: in casual conversations that involve sharing others ' private affairs
gossip.question: Have I engaged in casual conversations that involve sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I utilize my work on a Sunday, despite knowing it was unnecessary?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impiety.question: Did you use your day for work on Sunday when it otherwise could have been avoided, contrary to God's law that commands rest on His holy day?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

defraud.question: Did I use my Sunday for personal gain when it could have been dedicated to rest, worship, or serving others?
defraud.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).
